title: Everybody S Fine or Stanno Tutti Bene 1990 Ennio Morricone

sources.title: Everybody S Fine or Stanno Tutti Bene 1990 Ennio Morricone
sources.description: EVERYBODY'S FINE Stanno tutti bene Directed by Giuseppe Tornatore Italy, France, 1990 Drama, Comedy 118 min. Synopsis Matteo Scuro is a retired Sicilian bureaucrat (responsible mainly for the writing of birth certificates), a widower with five children, all of whom live on the mainland and hold responsible jobs. He decides to surprise each with a visit and finds none as he imagined.
